Token.Abstract: UTCSBouncyTableViewCell is a subclass of UITableViewCell that allows the content view of a cell to 'bounce'. The content view of a cell will bounce when the setHighlighted:animated: selector is performed with YES as the animated argument. The content view of a cell may also be bounced by explicitly calling bounceWithDirection:. The alpha of the cell's content view will also animate based on the direction of the bounce.
Bounces the content view of a cell in the given direction

Parameter.Name: bounceDirection
Parameter.Abstract: Direction to bounce the content view
